title: Happy Day logo
content:
Hello,  
any idea about this font?  
thx a lot.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803010504im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HappyDay_3674.png)
author: wonderfulgreg

comments.content:
Probably hand-done. Note the different variations on duplicate letters, mainly on counters (/a, /p). Reminds me of [Hubert Jocham's work](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803010504/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Hubert_Jocham_Type), something between [Drop](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803010504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/drop), [Crema](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803010504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/crema) and [Susa](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803010504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/susa)  
More alternatives: Sudtipos [Aventura](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803010504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/aventura) and [Caffelatte](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803010504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/cafelatte) Alt
